title: Glary Utilities Pro 5.38.0.58 + Serial Lifetime
description:
This torrent contains Glary Utilities Pro 5.38.0.58 (latest version) and a lifetime serial.



Glary Utilities is a software that provides you with the necessary tools for cleaning and maintaining your computer system. The interface of the program consists of a small, simple-to-use window. Novices shouldn't have any problems in getting around the tool. 



So you can scan fot issues revolving incorrect registry entries, invalit shortcuts, dangerous startup entries, tempiorary files, history and internet traces, spyware and adware.



But you can also remove junk files in order to up free space, clean up the Windows registry items, fix errors found in the start meneu and desktop, as well as uninstall programs from your computer.



Futhermore, you can manage applications which automatically run at system startup, monitor and optimize free memory, mange context menu entries and defrag the Windows registry.



Plus, you can erase the history, cookies and traces from your web browsers, use a shredder to permanently delete files beyond recovery, encrypt and decrypt files, analize disk spacer usage, locate and delete duplicate files, remove empty folders, join and split files, and more.



In addition, you can schedule a task, select the tracks you want to erase, set Glary Utilities Pro to automatically run at system startup, change the interface language, minimize to system tray, erase privacy tracks on Windows logoff of shutdown, and othersd.



The tool takes up a ;ow-to-moderate amount of system resources, includes a comprehensive help file and worked smoothly during my test. I haven't come across any issues and strongly recommend Glary Utilities Pro to all users.



Current Version: 5.38.0.58


File Size: 14.62 MB 
Release Date: November. 09, 2015 
Platform: Windows 32/64bit version. 
Languages: 44
Release Notes: Optimized Disk Cleaner: added 'PDFCreator' and 'Evernote'
Optimized Tracks Eraser: added 'Nitro PDF Reader 3' and 'Universal Extractor'
